name: Fallen Feathers
description:
Emerald is on a mission, and nothing and no one will stop them.

Honestly, there’s no plot, just avoid the robot birds and don’t get hit.

Toggle between WASD and Arrow keys in the controls.

Press space to move faster and make yourself smaller.

Pickup feathers to fly longer.

Getting hit reduces flight.

See how any points you can get, arcade style!
